data.name: Crimzon Clover WORLD IGNITION - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Preview the Crimzon Clover Original Soundtrack!

Original Soundtrack of Crimzon Clover WORLD IGNITION by potechi.

1.To the sky - again

2. Brave Soul

3. Cybernated City(stage1)

4. Lightning Challenger(stage1_another)

5. Titanix(stage1-boss)

6. Stage Clear

7. Through the wasteland(stage2)

8. Embraced Sunset(stage2_another)

9. Hecatoncheir(stage2-boss)

10. Transparent Stream(stage3)

11. Evil Miasma(stage3_another)

12. Maelstrom(stage3-boss)

13. Dark Clouds(stage4)

14. Bloody Expanse(stage4_another)

15. Diabolos(stage4-boss)

16. Heaven's Gate(stage5a)

17. Back of beyond(stage5b)

18. Tears of Wings(stage5a_another)

19. Prayer to end(stage5b_another)

20. Gorgoneion(stage5-boss)

21. Hereafter

22. Crimson Heart(final-boss)

23. Complete!!

24. Torch for peace

25. memories of...

26. Caravan Spirit(TimeAttack_1st)

27. Rail Chase!(TimeAttack_2nd)

28. Gameover

29. Cafe Cri-Cro

30. Cybernated City(FC)

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/vista/7/8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.80GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
